text: Based on the calculated molecular weights for Lsm11 NTD and FLASH NTD, the results from SEC-MALS showed that the FLASH NTD-Lsm11 NTD complex is a heterotrimer consisting of 2 molecules (a dimer) of FLASH and 1 molecule of Lsm11, while FLASH NTD C54S/C83A is a dimer ( Table 2) . The N-terminal domains of FLASH and Lsm11 form a 2:1 heterotrimer for histone pre-mRNA 3'-end processing
